wordClues.clue: It is a gas giant, and the second largest and second most massive planet in our Solar System.
the third planet from the Sun and the only astronomical object known to harbor life.
It's the hottest planet in our solar system.
The second smallest planet in the solar system, only larger than Mercury and slightly more than half the size of Earth.
The star that provides light and heat for the earth and around which the earth moves.
